inlineContent.text: is a framework that let you read and write id3 tag to your mp3 files, listed in the implementations section of the
It is compatible with the following platforms:
Below you can find the list of the official ID3 frames supported by ID3TagEditor:
In addition, ID3TagEditor supports the following iTunes unofficial frames:
All frames are encoded and formatted following the official specification:
text frames (frames with identifier starting with a capital T) uses UTF-16 to encode text
frames with ad hoc encoding and/or formatting are supported (for example recordingDateTime must always be a ISO88591 string)
frames with localized content support all the languages identifier contained in the ISO-639-2

abstract.text: A swift library to read and modify ID3 Tag of any mp3 file. Listed in the implementations section of the official ID3 standard website id3.org.
Movement Count frame name. Version 2.3 and 2.4 only
Grouping frame name. Version 2.3 and 2.4 only.
A struct to represent a simplified version of the attached picture frame and its content.
Used only as return type inside
Comment frame name.
Podcast category frame name. Version 2.3 and 2.4 only.
Mix Artist frame name.
A class to edit the ID3 tag of an mp3 file.
Builder used to create a ID32v2 tag.
It let the user set all the frames included in ID32TagCommonStringFramesBuilder,
ID32TagCommonCompositeFramesBuilder and RecordingHourMinuteDayMonthYearFramesBuilder.
Movement name frame name. Version 2.3 and 2.4 only.
ContentGrouping frame name.
Builder used to create a ID32v4 tag.
It let the user set all the frames included in ID32TagCommonStringFramesBuilder, ID32TagCommonCompositeFramesBuilder,
RecordingDateTimeFrameBuilder, FileOwnerFrameBuilder and ITunesFramesBuilder.
AlbumArtist  frame name.
Title frame name.
A struct used to represent the recording time for the ID3 recording date time frame.
A swift library to read and modify ID3 Tag of any mp3 file. Listed in the implementations section of the official ID3 standard website id3.org.
Genre frame name.
Enum that contains the version supported by ID3TagEditor.
A struct to represent a simplified version frames that contain a position (disc position, record position etc.).
Used only as return type inside
A class used to represent an ID3 frame that contains localized content to be used in the ID3 tag.
Only a subset of the ID3 frames support localized content. See the various ID3 tag builders to
understand which frames admit a locallized content.
See the official id3 documentation for a full list of frame with localized content.
A struct to represent a simplified version of frames that contain localized content.
Used only as return type inside
File Owner frame name. Version 2.3 and 2.4 only.
Original filename.
Length in milliseconds frame.
Artist frame name.
RecordingDayMonth frame name. Valid only for tag version 2.3 and 2.2. For version 2.4 use RecordingDateTime.
EncodedBy frame name.
Movement Index frame name. Version 2.3 and 2.4 only.
An enum that describes the ID3 picture type supported.
A class used to represent an ID3 track/disc position in the original recordings frame  in the ID3 tag.
A struct used to represent the recording date and time for the ID3 recording date time frame.
Builder used to create a ID32v3 tag.
It let the user set all the frames included in ID32TagCommonStringFramesBuilder, ID32TagCommonCompositeFramesBuilder,
RecordingHourMinuteDayMonthYearFramesBuilder, FileOwnerFrameBuilder and ITunesFramesBuilder.
EncoderSettings frame name.
A class used to represent an ID3 recording date time frame to be used in the ID3 tag.
Valid only for ID3 tag version 2.4.
A class used to represent an ID3 genre frame to be used in the ID3 tag.
Class that “makes your life easier” when it comes to read data from the ID3 tag.
Create an instance of this class by passing to it a
instance

In this way you will now have access to all the data contained in the ID3 tag by using the methods of this class.
Lyricist frame name
A struct used to represent the recording date for the ID3 recording date time frame.
Podcast keywords frame name, Version 2.3 and 2.4 only.
There are three ways to install ID3TagEditor in your project:
Unsynchronized lyrics frame name.
A class used to represent an ID3 recording hour minute frame to be used in the ID3 tag.
Valid only for ID3 tag version 2.3 and 2.2.
A struct that describes the properties of a tag.
Composer frame name.
A class that represent an ID3Tag frame. It contains the common information of all the ID3 frames.
A class used to represent an ID3 frame with an integer value.
Track Position frame name.
Beats per minute frame name.
AttachedPicture frame name
Disc Position frame name.

A class used to represent an ID3  frame with generic string data  in the ID3 tag.
This class is used to represent all the ID3 frames that contains plain string as data (e.g. Artist, Album, Title).
The attached picture format supported by the ID3 tag.
RecordingHourMinute frame name. Valid only for tag version 2.3 and 2.2. For version 2.4 use RecordingDateTime.
A struct to represent a simplified version of same frames that contain hour and minute data.
Used only as return type inside
Size in bytes frame. Valid only for tag version 2.2 and 2.3.
Album frame name.
RecordingDateTime frame name. Valid only for tag version 2.4. For version 2.2 and 2.3 use RecordingDateTime.
Subtitle frame name
Podcast Description frame name. Version 2.3 and 2.4 only.
A class used to represent an ID3 attached picture frame to be used in the ID3 tag.
List of language identifier used in frames that support localized content with language indication.
The list of supported languages corresponds to the ISO-639-2 standard.
Languages with multiple code are distinguished by “B” (bibliographic) or “T” (terminology).
A struct to represent a simplified version of the genre frame and its content.
Used only as return type inside
Publisher frame name.
Copyright frame name.
